author: wn.com
title: Justice denied: the Thai activist who risked all to save his environment (Greenpeace International)
text: ( Source : Greenpeace International ) The recent Thai Supreme Court acquittal of three men who masterminded the murder of environmental activist Charoen Wat-aksorn, shows a skewed justice system that puts capitalism in front of community. But
